channel.title: Project Castree 550
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Project Castree #550[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2][FONT=Trebuchet MS]After taking a break from RSPS, I've finally decided to come back with a 550 project! More information will come about this project. No promises of hosting as this project is intended to be a experimental one. If I end up not hosting this, I will probably release all of the 550 information that I've gathered.
[B][U]Server Information:[/U][/B] [B]Revision: [/B] 550 [B]Cache Revision:[/B] 550 loading 592 [B]Base:[/B] Project Cedia 530 (Hyperion now)
[SPOILER=Update List] [July 29, 2014] - Wrote a system handling attack styles interfaces(not done) - Fixed an appearance issue relating to NPCS - Most curses have their appropriate effects
[July 27, 2014] - Wrote switching between curses and normal prayers - Loading 592 data (item, sounds, gfx and anim) - Fixed a prayer switching issue - Fixed some equipment issues causing invisible arms and head
[July 26, 2014] - Identified some more packets (Configbyfile or client varpbits, csconfigs, sendMusic,sound,interfacetext) - You can now play music in the Music Player interface. Loop works as well - Added some region music to certain regions such as Lumbridge and Edgeville - Fixed some issues with equipment - NPC's version of appearance - Inventory item swapping
[July 24, 2014] - Updating Server - Login - All necessary npc masks - Player masks, missing force movement - Somewhat Equipment - Completed the 550 cache :) now 100% - Lots of packets - HD client - NPC Definitions - Varp Definitions - Item Definitions - ClientScript Definitions - Resizable and fixed interfaces [/SPOILER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SJ8jAAx.png[/img] [B]Player and NPC updating[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jMAnt4Y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TdCMa8a.png[/img] [B]Animation[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DJn9hYA.png[/img] [B]NPC Appearance lol[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CC05pd7.png[/img] [B]Quick Prayers[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1EQrLzx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/blGGi8b.png[/img] [B]Equipment[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3UVzfrl.png[/img] [B]Music Player[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lOiknsM.png[/img] [B]592 curses and items[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X2jpvkW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HNOxcUw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bc7JYOG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rAfWExp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CTGFUWL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RcYY8HQ.png[/img]
[B]Credits:[/B] - Leanbow - Graham - Fagex
[/CENTER]

item.title: Project Castree 550
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re seriously developing the era I was a fan of. And it’s looking great so far ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Project Castree 550
item.dc:creator: @cedia cedia
item.description:
@cedia wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:545373”]http://i.imgur.com/CC05pd7.png
^Lol’d.

Good luck on this, I’ll be following.[/quote]

Thanks man

Updates:
Now loading 592 items, anim, gfx, sounds and curses. 592 is the highest revision that I will load data from.

  • Added curses support to the existing regular prayers

TODO: Curse effects like soul split and leech prayers




[size=12pt]July 29:[/size]
Some updates:

  • Wrote a system handling attack styles interfaces(not done)
  • Fixed an appearance issue relating to NPCS
  • Most curses have their appropriate effects

I still need to bring the old hitpoints system back as its still constitution meaning 10x hp and hits

[size=12pt]HD Client Updates[/size]
Ported to jogl 2.2.2 from jogl 1.1.1. Reason I did this was because jogl 2+ has support for automatic native library loading so this means that both linux and mac are supported for HD

Before, I would have to manually download and place the libs in the correct directory but now it does it automatically for you.

I would’ve done it the way jagex did it for 603+(?) clients by storing the native libs in the cache and extracting it when needed but this is easier

Read full topic

item.title: Project Castree 550
item.dc:creator: @cedia cedia
item.description:
@cedia wrote:

Haha thanks guys

Ashi:

Good luck, still won’t beat my 550

We’ll see

Some old and new updates:

  • Identified some more packets (Configbyfile or client varpbits, csconfigs, sendMusic,sound,interfacetext)
  • You can now play music in the Music Player interface. Loop works as well
  • Added some region music to certain regions such as Lumbridge and Edgeville
  • Fixed some issues with equipment
  • NPC’s version of appearance
  • Inventory item swapping
  • Other small stuff


NPC Appearance lol. This is what you saw in the guard animation picture.

This means I can dynamically change the appearance of a certain NPC based on its client index. This includes:

  • Level
  • Name
  • Models
  • Head Icon
  • Render animation
  • and more mayb

In this picture, I changed the hero’s appearance to custom ones. If I spawn the same hero Id, it will have its original appearance as I’m not actually modifying the definitions itself. This could be useful for some custom bosses switching weapons ingame lol

Done via updating.

Read full topic
